title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 82.3 - Roads and parking areas
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 82.3 - Roads and parking areas

State Regulations

Vehicular use of roads posted against such use is
prohibited. Where required by posted notice, vehicles shall be parked only in
designated parking areas, and vehicles so parked shall not exceed the number
specified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
82.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
